title: Start
body:
<<outfit Aig Regular>>
<<outfit J-Pe Regular>>
<<outfit Lee Regular>>
<<flip Aig>>
<<flip Kent>>
<<move Aig StageRight2>>
<<move Lee StageRight1>>
<<move J-Pe CenterStage>>
<<move Kent StageLeft2>>
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Alright boys, let's get down to business.
As you know, your big debut is one month away.
Don't worry, I've already taken care of everything.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
So what should WE do?
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Whatever you want.
From now on, I leave it to you to determine your own schedules.
However, I suggest you use the next few weeks wisely.
Don't neglect practice. You boys have talent, but you could still brush up your vocals and choreography.
You could also spend some time doing a little self-promoting. 
But most importantly, make sure you're rested for the show.  I don't want you guys running around town all week just to collapse on stage.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Of course.
<<name Friendship J-Pe>>
Got it.
<<name Friendship Kent>>
Aig, did you get all that?
->Yes!
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Yup! I'm ready!
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    Good. Now I all want you to schedule your time carefully.
->So, I can do whatever I want?
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    So I can set up my weekly schedule however I want?
    <<name Friendship Kent>>
    Yes. It's entirely up to you. But I suggest you plan carefully.
Now let's get to work.
<<move J-Pe OffStageRight>><<move Lee OffStageRight>><<move Aig CenterStage>><<move Kent OffStageLeft>>
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Oh, man...I better plan my week.
<<move Aig OffStageRight>>
